features: 【Super Absorbent & Quick Drying】Our hair towel wrap is made from highly absorbent microfibre, ensuring efficient water absorption and rapid drying. It's breathable and odorless, providing a comfortable experience.

【Durable and Easy to Carry】Enjoy hassle-free drying with our hair towel wrap. It stays securely in place, allowing you to get dressed, check emails, and carry out tasks without any discomfort or worrying the towel fall off.

【Minimize Heat Damage】Our gentle microfibre hair towel promotes healthier drying without the need for excessive heat from a hairdryer. Reduce the risk of heat damage to your hair and maintain its natural beauty.
【Soft & Lightweight】Experience unparalleled lightness with our hair drying towel. It is exceptionally lightweight compared to other options, making it convenient to carry wherever you go.

【Versatile Size for All Hair Types】 With dimensions of 26 x 10 inches, our hair towel wrap is designed to fit most hair types and lengths. Whether you have short, long, straight, curly, or wavy hair, it provides optimal coverage and convenience.
description: Product Description Why you need our hair towel? Reduce heat damage caused by hair dryer and protect your hair. If you don't dry hair with the hair towel and dry with hair dryer directly, it will spend more time and also damage your hair. Save time with the microfiber hair towel. You can go to skin care, get dressed, check email and do anything while drying hair without discomfort. Then the moisture of the hair is almost absorbed after you complete these things. Multiple colors for you to choose. More choices for you: Gray + White + Pink + Blue + Purple. We have assembled a combination of popular colors on the market. You can choose it according to your needs. By using our hair drying towels, not only can dry your hair 50% faster, but are gentler on your hair and protect your hair from damaging caused by hair drye Elastic loop design makes it convenient. You can make up, get dressed, check email and do anything while drying your hair with the microfiber hair towel. Leaves you a super soft touch. Extremely lightweight when compared to other options. you can carry these hair drying towels everywhere you go.
